stack_human_readable:
when I receive "deleteClones"
    if <"isMaster" = "0">
        undoableDeleteSprite

when I receive "increaseInstance"
    change "instanceNumber" by 1

when I receive "createClones"
    if <"isMaster" = "1">
        set "isMaster" to "0"
        repeat 5
            set "instanceNumber" to "0"
            duplicateNoAttach
            broadcast "increaseInstance" and wait
        set "isMaster" to "1"

when I receive "deleteClones"
    if <"isMaster" = "0">
        undoableDeleteSprite

when I receive "increaseInstance"
    change "instanceNumber" by 1

when I receive "createClones"
    if <"isMaster" = "1">
        set "isMaster" to "0"
        repeat 5
            set "instanceNumber" to "0"
            duplicateNoAttach
            broadcast "increaseInstance" and wait
        set "isMaster" to "1"

when I receive "run"
    if <"is clone?" = "false">
        forever
            if <<"is clone?" = "false"> and <touching "mouse"?>>
                change "clones" by -1
                deleteClone
            point towards "mouse"
            move 10 steps

when green flag clicked
    hide
    go to x: 0 y: -100
    forever
        repeat 10
        if <"is clone?" = "true">
            set "is clone?" to "false"
            show
            createClone
            change "clones" by 1
            hide
            set "is clone?" to "true"
            broadcast "run"

when I receive "move!"
    if <"moved" = "0">
        move 4 steps
        set "moved" to "1"

when I receive "cloneit"
    if <"cloned" = "0">
        set "moved" to "0"
        createClone
        set "cloned" to "1"
        set "moved" to "1"
        broadcast "move!"

when I receive "YOU WIN"
    stop all

when I receive "NEXT LEVEL"
    next background
